entry.title: Welcome to the Rebar Plugins tutorial
entry.content:
A warm welcome if you’re new to the series. I’m still getting my head around both Jekyll and Octopress, so the structure of the site has been changing quite a bit. What I’ve finally settled on is

  • stand-alone pages for the individual articles in the series
  • a separate blog (i.e., what you’re reading now!) with news and updates

I hope this format works for readers and makes it easy to find your way around the site.
